page.title: 04Recreation Droxford Hall
page.content: {Droxford}Community Hall,is the hub of activity for many local organizations. From Mothers & Toddlers to the senior Citizen Golden Age,Beekeepers,Floral arts,Playgroup,British Legion etc make use of the Hall's facilities to enjoy and extend their own ideals.Each user Organization is invited to nominate a representative to the management commitee who with 4,5 other interested vilagers,combine to form a team whose objective is to ensure the continuation of the hall as a real benefit and assett to local life.This facility plays an important role in fostering the comunity spirit in {Droxford.}Winter 1985 will be warmer with the new electric heating system. Repainting next year thanks to a paint firm.Next project the kitchen.Once the School,it has dressing rooms,stage and side room.
